long_description: Both trail- and sidewalk-ready, the Teva Omnium 2 Sandals for girls offer a comfortable fit with quick, easy bungee lacing that makes it easy to get out the door and on to adventure. Quick-dry synthetic leather upper with mesh lining lets feet breathe and keeps them dry. Polyester mesh linings and integrated toe bumpers protect bare feet and help keep debris out of shoes; bungee laces offer easy entry and a comfortable, secure fit. Soft, compression-molded EVA midsoles supply all-day cushioning and shock absorption. Nonmarking Spider Rubber(R) outsoles provide great traction on a variety of surfaces. Teva Omnium 2 Sandals feature a Microban(R) antimicrobial treatment to deter odors. Closeout.
short_description: Both trail- and sidewalk-ready, the Teva Omnium 2 Sandals for girls offer a comfortable fit with quick, easy bungee lacing that makes it easy to get out the door and on to adventure.
